text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Still only had 6200 people in person. Which means you've still got a COVID-19 problem. So quit bitching for the sake of your ego, get off that generous ass of yours, and get to work and save some lives. Not even your supporters are dumb enough to think this disease is a hoax.
